tour: fix formulae for sqrt/cbrt exercises

Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go-tour.googlecode.com/hg

Fixed formulas lgtm

http://codereview.appspot.com/5248053/diff/1/static/index.html
File static/index.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5248053/diff/1/static/index.html#newcode1168
static/index.html:1168: Next, change the loop condition to stop once the value has stopped changing.
With the fixed formula, the value never stops changing (probably flips between two values, but haven't checked.) So maybe suggest a different exit condition.

subject: code review 5248053: tour: fix formulae for sqrt/cbrt exercises
